Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp23.maze

Class Player

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp23.maze.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the player in the game. It is responsible for storing the players inventory, chip count, and directional images.

    • Player

      public Player​(Tile location)
      Constructor for the Player class.
      Parameters:
      location - - The tile to draw the player on (Tile)

  • Method Details

    • checkItem

      public boolean checkItem​(java.lang.String item)
      Check if the players inventory has an item (used for keys). e.g. check if the player has the blue key for the blue door.
      Parameters:
      item - - The toString of the item (String)
      Returns:
      - True if the player has the item (Boolean)

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(java.lang.String item)
      Adds an item to the players inventory (used for keys). e.g. player picks up a blue key and calls addItem("blue_key") to add it to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - - The toString of the item (String)

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem​(java.lang.String item)
      Removes an item from the players inventory (used for keys). e.g. player opens a door and calls removeItem("blue_key") to remove it from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - - The toString of the item (String)

    • pickUpChip

      public void pickUpChip()
      Increases the players chip count by one. Used for when the player collects a chip.

    • getChips

      public int getChips()
      Getter for the chips field.
      Returns:
      chips - The number of chips the player has collected (int)

    • setChips

      public void setChips​(int newChips)
      Setter for the chips field (for testing purposes).
      Parameters:
      newChips - - the new value of chips

    • getInventory

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInventory()
      Getter for the inventory.
      Returns:
      inventory - the players inventory

    • setInventory

      public void setInventory​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> newInventory)
      Setter for the inventory.
      Parameters:
      newInventory - - the new inventory to replace the players current inventory

    • getCurrentTile

      public Tile getCurrentTile()
      Getter for the players current location.
      Returns:
      currentTile - the tile the player is currently on (Tile)

    • setCurrentTile

      public void setCurrentTile​(Tile newTile)
      Setter for the current tile (used when moving the player).
      Parameters:
      newTile - - the new location tile for the player (Tile)

    • getImage

      public java.lang.String getImage​(Tile.Directions d)
      Gets the appropriate image for a given direction (used when moving the player).
      Parameters:
      d - - direction of the image (Tile.Directions)
      Returns:
      String - the string of the correct direction image
